chapters.name: Mechanical Properties of Solids
chapters.desc: NCERT Class 11 Physics Part 2 Chapter 8 Mechanical Properties of Solids solutions. Young's Modulus and Elasticity, Stress-Strain Relationship, Stress-Strain Graphs, Elastic Properties, Young's Modulus Calculation, Shear Modulus.

chapters.name: Mechanical Properties of Fluids
chapters.desc: NCERT Class 11 Physics Part 2 Chapter 9 Mechanical Properties of Fluids solutions. Fluid Pressure, Surface Tension, Fluid Properties, Bernoulli's Principle, Pressure, Barometer.

chapters.name: Thermal Properties of Matter
chapters.desc: NCERT Class 11 Physics Part 2 Chapter 10 Thermal Properties of Matter solutions. Temperature Scales, Absolute Temperature Scales, Resistance Thermometer, Temperature Measurement, Gas Thermometer, Linear Thermal Expansion.

chapters.name: Thermodynamics
chapters.desc: NCERT Class 11 Physics Part 2 Chapter 11 Thermodynamics solutions. Heat and Work, Molar Specific Heat, Thermodynamic Processes, Adiabatic Process, First Law of Thermodynamics, Free Expansion.

chapters.name: Kinetic Theory
chapters.desc: NCERT Class 11 Physics Part 2 Chapter 12 Kinetic Theory solutions. Molecular Volume and Intermolecular Distance, Ideal Gas Law and Molar Volume, Ideal Gas Behavior, Ideal Gas Law Applications, Gas Laws - Combined Gas Law, Number of Molecules.

chapters.name: Oscillations
chapters.desc: NCERT Class 11 Physics Part 2 Chapter 13 Oscillations solutions. Periodic Motion, Simple Harmonic Motion, Periodic Motion from Graphs, SHM Functions, Signs in SHM, SHM Condition.

chapters.name: Waves
chapters.desc: NCERT Class 11 Physics Part 2 Chapter 14 Waves solutions. Speed of a Transverse Wave on a Stretched String, Speed of Sound, Speed of Transverse Wave, Speed of Sound in Air, Mathematical Representation of Waves, Reflection and Refraction of Waves.
